mapper.select: select xingming,grjcjs3,grjcbl,dwmc2 from grzhxx g inner join dwzh d on g.dwbh=d.dwbh and g.grbh=#{grbh}
select xingming,sbzh,d.dwbh as dwbh,dwmc2,grzhye,yhcxzh from grzhxx g inner join dwzh d on g.dwbh=d.dwbh and g.grbh=#{grbh}

select g.grbh as grbh,xingming,grjcjs3,grjcbl,dwmc2,khrq,grzhye,grzhzt from grzhxx g inner join dwzh d on g.dwbh=d.dwbh
dwmc2 like concat(concat('%',#{dwmc2}),'%') and xingming like concat(concat('%',#{xingming}),'%') and g.grbh=#{grbh}
select g.grbh as grbh,xingming,dwmc2,grzhye,sbzh from grzhxx g inner join dwzh d on g.dwbh=d.dwbh where g.grbh=#{grbh}
mapper.update: update grzhxx set grzhzt='封存中' where grbh=#{grbh}
update grzhxx set grzhye=#{grzhye} where grbh=#{grbh}
mapper.sql: GRBH, DWBH, ZJLXBH, DWZHZTBH, GRZH, XINGMING, XMQP, XINGBIE, GDDHHM2, SJHM2, CSNY, HYZK, ZHIYE, ZHICHENG, ZHIWU, XUELI, DZXX, YZBM, JTZZ, SBZH, JTYSR, DWZH3, SHENFEN, WDBH3, SJHMDR2, XMSZM2, XYZT, XYSM, WTYHMM, JYFWCS, GRJCJS3, GRZHZT, KHRQ, GRZHYE, GRZHSNJZYE, GRZHDNGJYE, GRYJCE, DWYJCE, XHRQ, XHYY, YHCXZH, CXZHKHYHMC2, CXZHKHYHDM2, DJLX, DQJS3, HQJS3, SNDQJS, SNHQJS, SNDQLX, SNHQLX, SNDQLXH, SNHQLXH, BNTQ3
